about_the_game:
A vast continent to explore, full of villages, cities, dangerous and secret places.
You are an Adventurer and as such you go on an adventure, you help people in need, you face fearsome creatures and, above all, you decide what to do with the life that is granted to you.
Face the dangers that populate Safìna: in the villages and cities, in the verdant plains and in the boundless deserts, in the icy mountains and in the inhospitable active volcanoes. Even the sea is no longer a safe place for those who don't know how to sail it.
The continent of Safina, under the leadership of the Royal Family and other institutions, hosts the majority of the Human population, and not only, divided more often than not by different ideas and beliefs. The Kingdom lived for decades between prosperity and crisis, making alliances and facing the Great War, which threatened the whole world, leaving it with not a few losses. He has now been at peace, albeit ephemeral, for 300 years.
But fate always reserves something unexpected.
